definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: rocky wall, cliff, Ex 17:6, Ex 17:6 (E), De 8:15 ([[הַחַלָּמִישׁ]] ´[[ח]]), Is 48:21, Is 48:21, Ps 78:15, Ps 78:20, Ps 105:41, Ps 114:8; (‖[[חַלָּמִישׁ]]); ´[[בּוֹא בַצּ]] Is 2:10, [[בִּמְעָרוֹת חֻרִים]] v:Is 2:19, ´[[בְּנִקְרוֹת הַצּ]] v:Is 2:21, cf. Ex 33:21, Ex 33:22 (JE); yielding honey (from its clefts) Ps 81:17 (cf. De 32:13; Dy Perles:Anal. 34 We rd. [[חוּף]]); as look-out Nu 23:9 (JE), home of goats 1Sa 24:3 (Gi v:2), snow-covered Je 18:14; bearing (olives for) oil De 32:13 (´[[חַלְמִישׁ ח]]), Job 29:6; resort of homeless Job 24:8, pierced by miners Job 28:10, cf. perh. [[נְחָלִים]] ´[[שִׁית בְּח]] [[אוֹפִיר]] Job 22:24 deposit (thy) gold in the rock of the wadys (most sub [[חׂר]] pebble); as quarry, fig. of Abr. as ancestor of Isr. Is 51:1; place of security 1Ch 11:15, [[הַמִּישׁוֹר]] ´[[ח]] Je 21:13 (of city), fig. Ps 27:5, Ps 61:3; symb. of firmness Na 1:6, Job 14:18, Job 18:4; enduring material Job 19:24.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: block of stone, boulder Ju Jdg 6:21, Jdg 13:19 (as altar); cf. [[חוּר מִכְשׁוֹל]] Is 8:14 (‖[[נֶגֶף אֶבֶן]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: rock with specif. name, [[עוֹרֵב]] ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 7:25, Is 10:26.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of a heathen god De 32:31, cf. Is 44:3, [[מִי חוּר]] ´[[מִבַּלְעֲדֵי א]] 2Sa 22:32 ‖ Ps 18:32, cf. 1Sa 2:2.—Vid. also [[בֵּית חוּר]] and [[תֶלְקַת הַצֻּרִים]].—Ps 89:44 v. [[חׂד]] sub III. [[חרר]], Ps 49:15 v. [[חוּרָה]] sub III. [[חור]]. above
